trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]追蹤服務會實作<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>介面引發<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件以通知執行階段追蹤基礎結構，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>針對特定工作流程<xref:System.Type>已變更。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤服務會提供工作流程使用 ProfileUpdatedEventArgs<xref:System.Type>和新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>至執行階段追蹤基礎結構。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>時，便會產生使用 ProfileUpdatedEventArgs<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 當它收到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件，執行階段追蹤基礎結構將會更新指定的工作流程的追蹤設定檔<xref:System.Type>其設定檔快取中。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個建構函式，當您將提高<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件追蹤服務，您必須明確地設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class that specifies a new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref>指定新的類別<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>指定之工作流程

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>會透過<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>設定為指定<xref:System.Type>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>設為指定的設定檔。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of workflow for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>為的工作流程<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>已變更。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定新<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>工作流程類型。

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當執行階段追蹤基礎結構收到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>它將會更新其設定檔的快取新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>的工作流程<xref:System.Type><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>所指定</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>的事件</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref>工作流程類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow whose <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Type>工作流程的其<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>應該更新。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>指定工作流程<xref:System.Type>的追蹤設定檔已變更。</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>設定為新追蹤設定檔。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 當執行階段追蹤基礎結構會接收<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件，它會更新與新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>工作流程<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>其設定檔快取</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>工作流程。</xref:System.Type>
